title: New President, New Memes
itunes:title: New President, New Memes
description:
Today on the show they had plenty of discussion about yesterday's inauguration, as well with the social media memes that came along with it. Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to Rand Paul for taking Biden’s speech personally when Biden said he wants to "dismantle white supremacy" and Angela Yee helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
